doc.title: Sanchez of Bel Air
doc.plot: Having earned finical success, self made business man, Ricardo Sanchez has moved his working class east LA born Chicano family into California's affluent Bel Air community. Following the "Pilot" episode they encounter much the same wacky fun you would expect from any sitcom of the mid-1980's, only rarely returning to any humor rooted specifically in the premise (i.e. Latino fish out of water in Anglo pond).
